    • Method Detail

      • addOrder

        @Transactional(rollbackFor=java.lang.Exception.class)
public void addOrder(Order order,
                                                                            java.util.List<java.lang.Long> carsId)
        adds new order record as well as attached orderItem records into the database.
        Parameters:
        order - entity that has to be saved in database
        carsId - list of cars which was picked in the order

      • updateOrderStatus

        @Transactional(propagation=MANDATORY,
               rollbackFor=java.lang.Exception.class)
public void updateOrderStatus(java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                            java.lang.String status)
        this method updates status of certain order
        Parameters:
        id - identifier of entity to update
        status - entity's parameter that has to be updated

      • getOrder

        public Order getOrder(java.lang.Long id)
        this method retrievs order entity from the database
        Parameters:
        id - identifier of entity to retrieve
        Returns:
        Order entity

      • getOrders

        public java.util.List<Order> getOrders()
        retrieves all orders from database without fetching OrderItem
        Returns:
        List of Order entities

      • getOrdersByUser

        public java.util.List<Order> getOrdersByUser(java.lang.Long userId)
        pulls out all orders from database which was made by certain user
        Parameters:
        userId - incoming parameter to filter out
        Returns:
        List of Order entities

      • getOrdersDetails

        public java.util.List<OrderUsersDetail> getOrdersDetails()
        pulls out short data about order from database as OrderUserDetail class
        Returns:
        List of OrderUserDetail representation class

      • getOrdersStatisticByUsers

        public java.util.List<OrderStatistics> getOrdersStatisticByUsers()
        pulls out statistic about orders that was made up by users. Such as total amount of money spend, user's id and user's name.
        Returns:
        List of OrderStatistics POJO representation class

      • getCompToAvg

        public void getCompToAvg()
        pulls out from database recursive statistic - order's id, user's id, bill of the order and average price of orders made up by user . This method uses window sql function to pull out required data. Requires modifications before using in the "production"!

      • getOrderReports

        public java.util.List<OrderDaily> getOrderReports()
        retrieves statistic how many orders and how much money was gained on each day
        Returns:
        list of OrderDaily class entities

      • getOrdersInfo

        public java.util.List<OrderInfo> getOrdersInfo()
        Retrieves short info about orders from the database as OrderInfo representation class. This method uses SqlResultSetMaping from entity to POJO class.
        Returns:
        List of OrderInfo objects
